vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀναζώννῡμι
or ἀναζωννύω, future -ζώσω, gird up again, recall to service, metaphorically, τινὰ ἐπὶ τοὺς λόγους[Refs 4th c.AD+] —middle, ἀ. τὰς ὀσφύας gird up one's loins, [NT+4th c.AD+]; ἀνεζωσμένοι, Latin alte praecincti, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]:—passive, to be held in check, of passions, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__2 middle, with accusative, πόλεμον embark on, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to gird (the loins), bind (to prepare for action); used figuratively of "girding the loins of the mind" (<ref='1Pe.1.13'>1Pe 1:13</ref>) to prepare mentally for action
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to gird (the loins), bind (to prepare for action); used figuratively of "girding the loins of the mind" (1Pe 1:13) to prepare mentally for action
to gird, with a belt or girdle; to gird one's self, 1Pet. 1:13*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: thắt (lưng). ẩn dụ : chuẩn bị tâm trí.
